decodeAndGetCEGState(Asset storage).details: Decode and load the CEGState of the asset

decodeAndGetFinalizedCEGState(Asset stor.details: Decode and load the finalized CEGState of the asset

encodeAndSetCEGTerms(Asset storage,CEGTe.details: Tightly pack and store only non-zero overwritten terms (LifecycleTerms)

encodeAndSetFinalizedCEGState(Asset stor.details: Tightly pack and store finalized CEGState

encodeAndSetCEGTerms(Asset storage,CEGTe.notice: All non zero values of the overwrittenTerms object are stored. It does not check if overwrittenAttributesMap actually marks attribute as overwritten.
